*div1 type="summary"* *p*Littleberry Hawkins to Austin, September 6, 1826. Publishes description of Texas in Kentucky papers. Interest in Texas. Santa Fé trade.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Lexington */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-06-1826">6 Sept 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin Esq*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*We keep continually published in the *location_mentioned*Papers */location_mentioned*some interesting discriptions of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*and shall Continue to do so the best description of the *location_mentioned*Country */location_mentioned*has been lately published in the *location_mentioned*Argus*/location_mentioned* Signed by *person_mentioned*Smith */person_mentioned*also a good description signed by *person_mentioned*Lewis */person_mentioned*I have seen *person_mentioned*Doct Koman*/person_mentioned* who lately returned he speaks well of the Coun- try any descriptions that you would have furnished to me shall be published at all times in great Henly(?) the Stage is Starting they are Not making as much Noise about the trade from *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned* to *location_mentioned*Santefee */location_mentioned*as formerly which makes in favor of your *location_mentioned*Grant*/location_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Mclain */location_mentioned*will say to You what is excitement in this *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*as to emigration and give You the Knews generally*/p* *p*Your friend*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*L H [Littleberry Hawkins,]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
